content: “Boston Public Schools talk about decolonizing their curriculum” Our world was irrevocably shaped by European colonialism. You can’t run from it and you can’t hide from it. Every single aspect of American life is the result of it. The language those “mostly black and Latino” students in the Boston Public Schools are speaking and writing in a European language and the modern life they live wouldn’t have been possible without that colonialism. Political correctness is delusional.
